segments.text: Mary , you have found several companies that are hiring , right ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , I have found three companies .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Have you called to inquire about the positions ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , but the results are not so satisfying .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I asked the first company about the vacancy , but they had already hired someone .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: The second one told me that the job information was released half a year ago , and had been overdue .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: The last company is still hiring , but not recent graduates .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Don't be discouraged . Just keep trying and you will find a job eventually .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Thanks for your support and care .
segments.speaker: S2
